{"resourceType" : "Parameters","parameter" : [{"name" : "result","valueBoolean" : false},{"name" : "system","valueUri" : "http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt"},{"name" : "code","valueCode" : "99235"},{"name" : "version","valueString" : "2023"},{"name" : "display","valueString" : "Hospital inpatient or observation care, for the evaluation and management of a patient including admission and discharge on the same date, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and moderate level of medical decision making. When using total time on the date of the encounter for code selection, 70 minutes must be met or exceeded."},{"name" : "message","valueString" : "Wrong Display Name 'Observation or inpatient hospital care for problems of moderate severity' for http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt#99235. Valid display is one of 11 choices: 'Hospital inpatient or observation care, for the evaluation and management of a patient including admission and discharge on the same date, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and moderate level of medical decision making. When using total time on the date of the encounter for code selection, 70 minutes must be met or exceeded.' (en), 'HOSPITAL INPATIENT OR OBSERVATION CARE, FOR THE EVALUATION AND MANAGEMENT OF A PATIENT INCLUDING ADMISSION AND DISCHARGE ON THE SAME DATE, WHICH REQUIRES A MEDICALLY APPROPRIATE HISTORY AND/OR EXAMINATION AND MODERATE LEVEL OF MEDICAL DECISION MAKING. WHEN USING TOTAL TIME ON THE DATE OF THE ENCOUNTER FOR CODE SELECTION, 70 MINUTES MUST BE MET OR EXCEEDED.' (en), 'HOSPITAL IP/OBS CARE SAME DATE MOD MDM 70 MIN' (en), 'HOSP IP/OBS SAME DATE MOD 70' (en), 'Initial hospital care with same-day admission and discharge with moderate level of medical decision making, per day, if using time, at least 70 minutes' (en), 'Hospital inpatient care with admission and discharge on same date, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate examination and history and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en), 'Hospital inpatient care with admission and discharge on same date, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate examination and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en), 'Hospital inpatient care with admission and discharge on same date, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate history and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en), 'Hospital observation care with admission and discharge on same date, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate examination and history and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en), 'Hospital observation care with admission and discharge on same date, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate history and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en) or 'Hospital observation care with admission and discharge on same date, per day, for evaluation and management of patient requiring medically appropriate examination and moderate level of medical decision making. If using time, at least 70 minutes total time on encounter date must be met.' (en) (for the language(s) 'en-US')"},{"name" : "issues","resource" : {"resourceType" : "OperationOutcome","issue" : [{"extension" : [{"url" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/operationoutcome-message-id","valueString" : "Display_Name_for__should_be_one_of__instead_of"}],"severity" : "error","code" : "invalid","details" : {"coding" : [{"system" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/tx-issue-type","code" : "invalid-display"}],"text" : "Wrong Display Name 'Observation or inpatient hospital care for problems of moderate severity' for http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt#99235.
